quest.name: Material Woes
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Guidingway has a request that only an adventurer such as yourself could fulfill.
objectives: Defeat a daphnia and obtain its remains.
Deliver the daphnia's remains to Guidingway.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are. Do you have a moment? While going over the resources sent by our collaborators, I stumbled upon a rather curious morsel of information that wants for verification.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Is it true that you procure crafting materials from other living creatures, and thereafter use them to craft without using creation magicks?

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Incredible! I'd like to try my hand at it, but first I'll require materials to craft with...

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Considering what resources are here in Mare Lamentorum, I thought a daphnia would be the perfect specimen to harvest material from, but I am hardly a hunter.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: But that's where you come in! Being Hydaelyn's champion and all, I have no doubt you can handle a daphnia or two. Might I trouble you to bring one back for study?

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Wonderful! The daphnia inhabit the area around Lovingway's Darlings, if you're looking for a place to start. Happy hunting!

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: You should have no trouble finding a daphnia near Lovingway's Darlings.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Welcome back. I take it you have a daphnia for me? Or what's left of one, I suppose.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, goodness! Apologies, I've never seen one this close before.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Yes... As I thought, the skin is quite elastic.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: With this, it should prove no trouble at all to produce clothing for people of all sizes!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Wouldn't clothes from that be a little too...translucent?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Are you sure clothes made from that are a good idea?

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: I had hoped you would approve! We'll make the finest garb for you and your kind.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Now that you mention it... We'll have to come up with a rigorous dye treatment to ensure the cloth isn't too revealing.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: What's the matter? The resulting garments will be highly practical, not to mention comfortable.

dialogue.name: GUIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: In any case, you've been a great help. It's not much, but I'd like you to have this.
